name: carbon
title: Carbon
desc: A directory template for curated design tools
article:
Carbon is a bold, minimal template for creative directories and curated collections. Built for speed and clarity, it combines dark aesthetics, vibrant accents, and structured content layoutsâperfect for platforms showcasing tools, links, or inspiration.
